abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that travels in a straight line, dealing damage to enemy units along the way. While the orb is in motion, Puck can launch itself to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
abilities.notes: Provides flying vision along its path.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck releases a burst of dust that deals damage and silences enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.notes: Silences all enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm and hidden from enemies.
abilities.notes: Can be used to disjoint projectiles and dodge damage.

abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.description: Puck teleports to where its Illusory Orb is currently located.
abilities.notes: Can only be used while Illusory Orb is in flight.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for a short duration. If the enemy heroes move too far from the center, the coil will snap, dealing additional damage and applying a longer stun.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, Dream Coil stun pierces spell immunity, and increases duration and stun.
